SEARCH
Package com.veeva

Class ThreadLocalImplementation

java.lang.Object
com.veeva.ThreadLocalImplementation
public class ThreadLocalImplementation extends Object
Provides thread-local storage for WebDriver and test data instances. This class ensures that each thread has its own instance of WebDriver and test data, allowing for thread-safe operations in parallel testing environments.
